conclusion: Analyze how the shadows labeled A, B, C, and D will change when the light source moves to the front right, away from the objects.

premise: Light source moves to the front right and away from the objects.

Shadows become more similar in size to the object (less magnification).
Shadows become more parallel (less divergent).
